alert.note: Alert for Adair; Bourbon; Boyle; Casey; Clark; Fayette; Franklin; Garrard; Harrison; Jessamine; Lincoln; Madison; Mercer; Nicholas; Russell; Scott; Woodford (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 7:58PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Garrard, Clark, north central Russell, Jessamine, Nicholas, Casey, Harrison, northeastern Franklin, east central Adair, Lincoln, southeastern Mercer, northeastern Woodford, Scott, Bourbon, eastern Boyle, Madison and Fayette Counties through 845 PM EDT/745 PM CDT/... At 756 PM EDT/656 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles west of Georgetown to near Meadowthorpe to near Nicholasville to 8 miles southwest of Liberty. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Lexington, Nicholasville, Highlands, Meadowthorpe, Cardinal Hill, Northland, Dunbar High School, U K Arboretum and Chevy Chase around 800 PM EDT. Georgetown, Thoroughbred Acres and Bryan Station around 805 PM EDT. Veterans Park and Fayette Mall around 810 PM EDT. Cadentown around 815 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Paris, Cynthiana, Winchester and Carlisle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT/900 PM CDT/ for south central and central Kentucky.

area.areaDesc: Adair; Bourbon; Boyle; Casey; Clark; Fayette; Franklin; Garrard; Harrison; Jessamine; Lincoln; Madison; Mercer; Nicholas; Russell; Scott; Woodford
